TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but now you gets sick before you eat them.

I wish for a less laggier KSP.

Granted, but still it would be laggy on your computer.

I wish for a strap-on rocket booster.

Granted, but it's strapped onto you.

I wish for a burger.

Granted, but it's strapped onto you.

I wish for a burger.

Granted, its from McDonalds.

I wish I could go to space.

Granted. You have just been teleported to an empty void with no protection, heat, or anything. No light, no.... nothing.

I wish to have less weight.

Granted, you now have negative mass.

I wish that I had mad trolling skillz.

Edited May 1, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted. I see your trolling and raise you a banishment.

I wish I was in space.

Granted, but you don't get a space suit.

I wish I could enter sci-fi universes.

Granted. This is the first lifeform you meet:

I wish I had a sonic screwdriver

Granted, but you don't know how to control it.

I wish I could explore that huge library in the TARDIS from the latest Dr. Who episode.

(Journey to the Centre of the TARDIS)

Granted, but since you are in the library during that episode, you are brutally killed by the time zombies.

I wish that I had a space battleship.

Granted, I promptly sink it

I wish for more Toblerones

Granted, but now you are made of Tolberones and then you are ravenously devoured by a massive Tolberone seeking mob after they smell the first hint of delicious Tolberone on you.

I wish that I was the owner of Tolberone Tower, a tower made of... you know.

Granted, but the sun hits it and it melts.

I wish I could have Tony Stark's cool suit (you know, the REALLY AWESOME suit).

Wish granted, but it's too small to fit.

I wish to achieve stable orbit around Eeloo

Granted, but you ran out of fuel.

I wish for an uninterruptable internet connection.

granted, have fun with the 10000000ms ping times though

I wish that I did not have to leave all my friends in college for the summer and maybe indefinitely.

Granted, your entire college is now cryogenically frozen.

I wish struts were stronger and also had built-in SRBs.

Granted. There to strong and tear apart your ship.

I wish for a wish to bypass the limited wishes rule by genies.

Granted, but they will now only grant wishes for more wishes.

I wish for a tuxedo.

Granted, you receive a monkey's paw. It grants 5 wishes,

[EDIT]: This damn thread is full of sniping. Granted, but the tuxedo is designed for a penquin

I wish for the ability to transit dimensions

Granted, but all the other dimensions are Adam Sandler films.

I wish Jupiter was a second sun instead of just a boring gas giant so we could one-up those Alpha Centaurians.

Granted. Welcome to the world of 2010: Odyssey Two. You're trapped on Discovery One, goodluck.

I wish that HAL Didn't become super evil and crazy.

Edited May 2, 2013 by Rockcoole

Doesn't sound too bad, actually. Everyone who was on that ship when it got destroyed got to become a starbaby or whatever, and that seemed quite neat.

Granted, but unfortunately he spends the rest of the trip terribly bored when all the scientists are busy doing their stuff.

I wish I could build and launch spacecraft from my Laythe base.

Granted, but they can only have 3 part.

I wish I didn't wish to not have a wish.
